attributes.action: Instruct Primary Care Trusts to refuse applications to set up Pharmacies in rural areas which have a Doctor Dispensing Practice, unless this is supported by the local community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yarnton in Oxfordshire, has a part time medical practice in the village which dispenses its own prescriptions. If a pharmacy is allowed to open in the village, doctor dispensing will have to cease. This will take essential finance away from the surgery which will then probably close. Patients will have to travel to the surgery in Kidlington where they will collect their prescriptions and the village chemist will close due to lack of business. 
The end result will be that the village will have no surgery and no chemist.
